welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cloverly, where small town charm and big city opportunities meet. Take a stroll through our quaint streets and discover the hidden gems that make our city unique. Enjoy your stay in Cloverly!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for Delta and United Airlines.

wifi.note: This WiFi network is free for all passengers, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
